markings: Watermark: Gothic \"Y\" with a cross, close to Briquet 9183
text: This engraving is the third plate in the Passion series. Christ is led before the high priest Annas by Malchus. At the left, Saint Peter is recognized as a disciple of Christ by a maidservant and is seized by a soldier. In a rear room to the left, Christ is blindfolded and mocked.
title: Christ Before Annas
